info.title: DataFlyr flight API
info.description: Search for flights data, like prices, schedules or delays. Returns detailed information about one-way flights, including price, duration, layovers, and other flight details.

get.summary: Get one-way flights between two airports
get.description: Returns detailed information about one-way flights, including price, duration, layovers, and other flight details. You can retrieve all available flights, or filter to get the cheapest or best option.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: IATA code of the departure airport, e.g.: JFK

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: IATA code of the destination airport, e.g.: LAX

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Flight date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g.: 2025-12-21

parameters.name: num_adults
parameters.description: Number of adult passengers, e.g.: 1

parameters.name: num_kids
parameters.description: Number of child passengers, e.g.: 0

parameters.name: num_inf
parameters.description: Number of infant passengers, e.g.: 0

parameters.name: cabin_class
parameters.description: Cabin class for the flight. One of: Economy, Premium_Economy, Business, First

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Filter parameter. Use 'cheapest' to get only the cheapest one-way flight, or 'best' to get the best-scored flight based on price, layovers, and layover times.

get.summary: Get round-trip flights between two airports
get.description: Returns detailed information about round-trip flights for a complete journey, including price, duration, layovers, and other flight details. You can retrieve all flight options, or filter to get the cheapest or best results.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: IATA code of the departure airport, e.g.: JFK

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: IATA code of the destination airport, e.g.: NRT

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: Outbound flight date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g.: 2025-12-21

parameters.name: arrival_date
parameters.description: Return flight date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g.: 2025-12-28

parameters.name: num_adults
parameters.description: Number of adult passengers, e.g.: 1

parameters.name: num_kids
parameters.description: Number of child passengers, e.g.: 0

parameters.name: num_inf
parameters.description: Number of infant passengers, e.g.: 0

parameters.name: cabin_class
parameters.description: Cabin class for the flight. One of: Economy, Premium_Economy, Business, First

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Filter parameter. Use 'cheapest' to get only the cheapest round-trip flight, or 'best' to get the best-scored flight based on price, layovers, and layover times.

get.summary: Track a specific flight by flight number
get.description: Provides real-time or scheduled tracking information for a specific flight. Returns detailed information including departure, arrival, aircraft type, and current flight status. You can retrieve full flight details or focus on delay information.

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: Flight number (numeric part only), e.g.: 33

parameters.name: airline
parameters.description: Airline IATA code, e.g.: DL

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Flight date in YYYYMMDD format, e.g.: 20251024

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Filter parameter. Use 'delay' to return only delay-related data (departure and arrival delays in minutes). A negative delay means the flight departed or arrived earlier than scheduled.
